name: scryfall-dxt
description: Desktop Extension for Scryfall API integration - search, download, and manage Magic: The Gathering card data

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec 'npm run build && node dist/index.js'
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:dxt
scripts.package:dxt: zip -r scryfall-dxt.zip manifest.json dist/ package.json package-lock.json README.md assets/ && npm run package:deps
scripts.package:deps: cd node_modules && zip -r ../scryfall-dxt.zip @modelcontextprotocol/ better-sqlite3/ commander/ zod/ && cd ..
